co.edu.javeriana.ambulancias.presentacion

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.edu.javeriana.ambulancias.presentacion.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils.java -------------------------------------------------- This class is created to have useful utilities to help the printing of menus, date formating and more methods.
    Author:
    Hernan Cote y Juan Pablo Penaloza

      static void pacientesAtendidos(EmpresaAmbulancias emresaAmbulancias)
      Prints all the services weather the have been completed, in process or not assigned for each service it prints the hour, name, type of service, phone address, state and the doctor or nurse that is currently with the patience if there is one.

      • registrarServicio

        public static void registrarServicio(EmpresaAmbulancias empresaAmbulancias)
        Gets the name, phone, type of service, address, and all the data needed to create an object of type Direccion and an object of type Servicio. Then it calls a method of EmpresaAmbulancias for it to add the Servicio to it's list of Servicio.
        Parameters:
        empresaAmbulancias -

      • pacientesAtendidos

        public static void pacientesAtendidos(EmpresaAmbulancias emresaAmbulancias)
        Prints all the services weather the have been completed, in process or not assigned for each service it prints the hour, name, type of service, phone address, state and the doctor or nurse that is currently with the patience if there is one.
        Parameters:
        emresaAmbulancias - an object of business class.
